New Records: Bailey Falter pitched a no-hitter through six innings against the Miami Marlins on September 11, 2024.
Key Match Events: Bailey Falter struck out the side in the first inning with 10 pitches and had five strikeouts in total during the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pittsburgh Pirates had been no-hit by the Chicago Cubs in a previous game on September 4, 2024.
